title: Miniature sunflower bouquet in ceramic vase for 1:12 scale dollhouse decoration
description: Add a burst of sunny warmth to your dollhouse with this handcrafted 1:12 scale miniature bouquet of five vibrant sunflowers, arranged in a chic white ceramic vase. Each sunflower is carefully sculpted, painted by hand, and mounted on a realistic stem with slightly extra length so you can trim to your preference and place them as you like. The flowers are not fixed in the vase, allowing you to reposition each stem or use the sunflowers separately if desired. Perfect for yourâ€¦
